metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8855 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - low
metadata.Description:
wolfSSL before 3.11.0 does not prevent wc_DhAgree from accepting amalformed DH key.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8855` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwolfssl24 - 3.13.0+dfsg-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: wolfssl package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.13.0+dfsg-1').
